document_data.name: Elphaendim
document_data.mainbody: '''Elphaendim''' was one of the merchant organizations and a noble families from the city of [[Arrabar]] in the [[Vilhon Reach]].
document_data.Organization: House Elphaendim employed a sizable mercenary and guard forces as well as house mages, like other merchant houses of Arrabar.
document_data.History:
by the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], the Elphaendim family was led by [[Thalammose Elphaendim]], a respected patriarch, often called The Old Elf behind his back for his quiet demeanor and rumored impressive archaist skills. Thalammose's favorite scion was his great-niece [[Cauvra Elphaendim]]. The young girl was still a few years away from her sixteenth birthday celebration in [[1373 DR]], and the patriarch felt protective of his great-niece. The Old Elf took to mentoring Cauvra as he saw burgeoning [[wizard]]ly skills in the young woman. Another famous family member was [[Brastynbold Elphaendim]]. A boisterous bear of a man with many stories of his brawls and feats of strength circulating the noble circles Arrabar.

Elphaendim family attended [[Emriana Matrell]]'s grand sixteenth birthday celebration at the [[Matrell]] estate on [[Tarsakh 13]] of the {{YearlinkName|1362}}. Young Emriana was childhood friends with Cauvra, but they drifted apart as Cauvra's tutoring in ''[[the Art]]'' started. Members of House Elphaendim, along with other guests, witnessed an assassination attempt at the matriarch of [[House Matrell]] â€“ [[Hetta Matrell]] during the celebration.
